title: Homemade pickling spice
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons whole mustard seeds', '1 tablespoon whole allspice berries', '2 teaspoons whole coriander seeds', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 bay leaves, crumbled', '2 cinnamon sticks, broken in half', '6 whole cloves']
